The UN is not meant to be a nice place. It's a place where assholes can talk to (or at least at) each other instead of shooting right away.
As Churchill one said, jaw, jaw, jaw (talking) is better than war, war, war.

Can't stop all wars, but how many does it have to stop before it becomes worth the effort to maintain? I say it's already well past that mark.

The UN serves it's purpose reasonably well. Not saying there's no room for improvement but we could do a lot worse. We did a lot worse without it.
